thread.title: Coldplay and The Chainsmokers Are a Match Made in EDM Heaven With Their New Single
thread.title_full: Coldplay and The Chainsmokers Are a Match Made in EDM Heaven With Their New Single

author: Maggie Pehanick
title: Coldplay and The Chainsmokers Are a Match Made in EDM Heaven With Their New Single
text:
The Chainsmokers and Coldplay "Something Just Like This" Coldplay and The Chainsmokers Are a Match Made in EDM Heaven With Their New Single February 23, 2017 97 Shares Chat with us on Facebook Messenger. Learn what's trending across POPSUGAR. 
Just when you thought your love for Coldplay had maybe, kinda, sorta faded, the Brit pop group collaborated with The Chainsmokers for a new song called "Something Just Like This." Between The Chainsmokers' synthy beat and Chris Martin 's recognizable vocals, the bouncy single sounds unmistakably like the work of both bands. It might be the perfect dance song? Listen, then you tell us. Related:
